content:
There are several UK businesses that have notable in-house design teams. Here are a few examples:

1. BBC - The BBC has a large in-house design team responsible for creating graphics, animations, and branding for its television channels, websites, and other media. The team is led by Creative Director, Greg McLeod.
2. Dyson - Dyson has a large in-house design team that is responsible for creating the visual and product design of its vacuum cleaners, hair dryers, and other home appliances. The team is led by Chief Design Officer, Jake Dyson.
3. Jaguar Land Rover - Jaguar Land Rover has a large design team that is responsible for creating the visual and product design of its luxury cars. The team is led by Director of Design, Julian Thomson.
4. Rolls-Royce - Rolls-Royce has a large in-house design team that is responsible for creating the design of its luxury cars. The team is led by Director of Design, Giles Taylor.
5. The Guardian - The Guardian has an in-house design team responsible for creating the visual design and user experience of its website and mobile app. The team is led by Creative Director, Alex Breuer.

These UK businesses recognize the importance of design in creating successful products and services and have invested in building large in-house design teams to drive their success.
